verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> about, when<WH9201> David<WH1732> dwelt<WH3427> in his house,<WH1004> that David<WH1732> said<WH559> to Nathan<WH5416> the prophet,<WH5030> "Behold,<WH2009> I am dwelling<WH3427> in a house<WH1004> of cedar,<WH730> but the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the Lord<WH3068> is under<WH8478> curtains.<WH3407>"
Then Nathan<WH5416> said<WH559> to David,<WH1732> "Do<WH6213> all<WH3605> that is in your heart,<WH3824> for God<WH430> is with you."
And it came<WH1961> about the same<WH1931> night,<WH3915> that the word<WH1697> of God<WH430> came<WH1961> to Nathan,<WH5416> saying,<WH559>
"Go<WH1980> and tell<WH559> David<WH1732> My servant,<WH5650> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> "You shall not build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> for Me to dwell<WH3427> in;

for I have not dwelt<WH3427> in a house<WH1004> since<WH4480> the day<WH3117> that I brought<WH5927> up Israel<WH3478> to this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> but I have gone<WH1961> from tent<WH168> to tent<WH168> and from [one] dwelling<WH4908> place<WH4908> [to another.]

"In all<WH3605> places where<WH834> I have walked<WH1980> with all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> have I spoken<WH1696> a word<WH1697> with any<WH259> of the judges<WH8199> of Israel,<WH3478> whom<WH834> I commanded<WH6680> to shepherd<WH7462> My people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> 'Why<WH4100> have you not built<WH1129> for Me a house<WH1004> of cedar<WH730>?'"'

"Now,<WH6258> therefore, thus<WH3541> shall you say<WH559> to My servant<WH5650> David,<WH1732> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> "I took<WH3947> you from the pasture,<WH5116> from following<WH310> the sheep,<WH6629> that you should be leader<WH5057> over<WH5921> My people<WH5971> Israel.<WH3478>

"And I have been<WH1961> with you wherever<WH3605> <WH834> you have gone,<WH1980> and have cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> all<WH3605> your enemies<WH340> from before<WH6440> you; and I will make<WH6213> you a name<WH8034> like the name<WH8034> of the great<WH1419> ones<WH1419> who<WH834> are in the earth.<WH776>

"And I will appoint<WH7760> a place<WH4725> for My people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> and will plant<WH5193> them, that they may dwell<WH7931> in their own place<WH8478> and be moved<WH7264> no<WH3808> more;<WH5750> neither<WH3808> shall the wicked<WH9390> <WH1121> waste<WH1086> them anymore<WH3254> as formerly,<WH7223>

even from the day<WH3117> that I commanded<WH6680> judges<WH8199> [to be] over<WH5921> My people<WH5971> Israel.<WH3478> And I will subdue<WH3665> all<WH3605> your enemies.<WH340> Moreover, I tell<WH5046> you that the Lord<WH3068> will build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> for you.

"And it shall come<WH1961> about when<WH3588> your days<WH3117> are fulfilled<WH4390> that you must go<WH1980> [to be] with your fathers, that I will set<WH1> up [one of] your descendants<WH6965> after<WH2233> you, who<WH310> shall be of your sons;<WH834> and I will establish<WH1121> his kingdom.<WH3559>
"He shall build<WH1129> for Me a house,<WH1004> and I will establish<WH3559> his throne<WH3678> forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>
"I will be his father, and he shall be My son;<WH1> and I will not take<WH1121> My lovingkindness<WH5493> away<WH2617> from him, as I took<WH5493> it from him who<WH5493> was before<WH834> you.
"But I will settle<WH3427> him in My house<WH1004> and in My kingdom<WH4438> forever,<WH5704> <WH5769> and his throne<WH3678> shall be established<WH3559> forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>"' "
According to all<WH3605> these<WH428> words<WH1697> and according to all<WH3605> this<WH2088> vision,<WH2377> so<WH3651> Nathan<WH5416> spoke<WH1696> to David.<WH1732>

Then David<WH1732> the king<WH4428> went<WH935> in and sat<WH3427> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> and said,<WH559> "Who<WH4310> am I, O Lord<WH3068> God,<WH430> and what<WH4310> is my house<WH1004> that Thou hast brought<WH935> me this<WH1988> far<WH1988>?

"And this<WH2088> was a small<WH6994> thing<WH6994> in Thine eyes,<WH5869> O God;<WH430> but Thou hast spoken<WH1696> of Thy servant's house<WH1004> for a great<WH7350> while<WH7350> to come,<WH7350> and hast regarded<WH7200> me according to the standard<WH8447> of a man<WH120> of high<WH4609> degree,<WH4609> O Lord<WH3068> God.<WH430>
"What<WH4100> more<WH3254> can David<WH1732> still<WH5750> [say] to Thee concerning the honor<WH9202> [bestowed] on Thy servant<WH5650>? For Thou knowest<WH3045> Thy servant.<WH5650>

"O Lord,<WH3068> for Thy servant's sake,<WH5668> and according to Thine own heart,<WH3820> Thou hast wrought<WH6213> all<WH3605> this<WH2088> greatness,<WH1420> to make<WH3045> known<WH3045> all<WH3605> these great<WH1420> things.<WH1420>

"O Lord,<WH3068> there<WH369> is none<WH369> like<WH3644> Thee, neither<WH369> is there<WH369> any God<WH430> besides<WH2108> Thee, according to all<WH3605> that we have heard<WH8085> with our ears.<WH241>

"And what<WH4310> one<WH259> nation<WH1471> in the earth<WH776> is like Thy people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> whom<WH834> God<WH430> went<WH1980> to redeem<WH6299> for Himself [as] a people,<WH5971> to make<WH7760> Thee a name<WH8034> by great<WH1420> and terrible<WH3372> things,<WH3372> in driving<WH1644> out nations<WH1471> from before<WH6440> Thy people,<WH5971> whom<WH834> Thou didst redeem<WH6299> out of Egypt<WH4714>?
"For Thy people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> Thou didst make<WH5414> Thine own people<WH5971> forever,<WH5704> <WH5769> and Thou, O Lord,<WH3068> didst become<WH1961> their God.<WH430>

"And now,<WH6258> O Lord,<WH3068> let the word<WH1697> that Thou hast spoken<WH1696> concerning<WH5921> Thy servant<WH5650> and concerning<WH5921> his house,<WH1004> be established<WH539> forever,<WH5704> <WH5769> and do<WH6213> as Thou hast spoken.<WH1696>

"And let Thy name<WH8034> be established<WH539> and magnified<WH1431> forever,<WH5704> <WH5769> saying,<WH559> 'The Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> is the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> [even] a God<WH430> to Israel;<WH3478> and the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> Thy servant<WH5650> is established<WH3559> before<WH6440> Thee.'

"For Thou, O my God,<WH430> hast revealed<WH1540> <WH241> to Thy servant<WH5650> that Thou wilt build<WH1129> for him a house;<WH1004> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> Thy servant<WH5650> hath found<WH4672> [courage] to pray<WH6419> before<WH6440> Thee.
"And now,<WH6258> O Lord,<WH3068> Thou art God,<WH430> and hast promised<WH1696> this<WH2088> good<WH9186> thing<WH9186> to Thy servant.<WH5650>

"And now<WH6258> it hath pleased<WH2974> Thee to bless<WH1288> the house<WH1004> of Thy servant,<WH5650> that it may continue<WH1961> forever<WH5769> before<WH6440> Thee; for Thou, O Lord,<WH3068> hast blessed,<WH1288> and it is blessed<WH1288> forever.<WH5769>"
